upgrade.name: Farm, second floor
upgrade.effect: Farms can host 3 more peoples.

upgrade.name: Farm, third floor
upgrade.effect: Farms can host 3 more peoples.

upgrade.name: Plantation of oats
upgrade.effect: Farms produce milk, need 1 more worker.

upgrade.name: Plantation of coco
upgrade.effect: Farm production increase, need 1 more worker.

upgrade.name: Plantation of rice
upgrade.effect: Farm production increase, need 1 more worker.

upgrade.name: Plantation of soy
upgrade.effect: Farm production increase, need 1 more worker.

upgrade.name: Spelt cultivation
upgrade.effect: Smart farm milk production increase, need 1 more worker.

upgrade.name: Flax cultivation
upgrade.effect: Smart farm milk production increase, need 1 more worker.

upgrade.name: Hemp cultivation
upgrade.effect: Smart farm milk production increase, need 1 more worker.

upgrade.name: Growing cashew
upgrade.effect: Fantasy farm milk production increase, need 1 more worker.

upgrade.name: Growing hazelnut
upgrade.effect: Fantasy farm milk production increase, need 1 more worker.

upgrade.name: Growing almond
upgrade.effect: Fantasy farm milk production increase, need 1 more worker.

upgrade.name: Curiosity milking
upgrade.effect: Workers level 1 produce milk.
upgrade.desc: Dint to see their cattle being milked, some Farm Girl got curious about the process ...

upgrade.name: Volunteer milking
upgrade.effect: Workers level 2 produce milk.
upgrade.desc: Dint to take care of slaves, some girls wanted to help them more.

upgrade.name: Experimental milking
upgrade.effect: Workers level 3 produce milk.
upgrade.desc: Dint to make experiments, some girls began to take themselves for guinea pigs.

upgrade.name: Contaminated milking
upgrade.effect: Workers level 4 produce milk.
upgrade.desc: Due to their not so legal activity some girls were contaminated with strange disease.

upgrade.name: Perverted milking
upgrade.effect: Workers level 5 produce milk.
upgrade.desc: After eons, even the most stubborn eventually felt the need to be milked.

upgrade.name: Fated milking
upgrade.effect: Workers level 6 produce milk.
upgrade.desc: In the end, even the greatest girls accepted to give their milk.

upgrade.name: Social contract
upgrade.effect: The costs of dismissal are reduced by 50%.

upgrade.name: Disposable workers
upgrade.effect: Workers can be dismissed for free.

upgrade.name: Owned workers
upgrade.effect: Workers are sold for 30% of their buy price and can be reformed into cattle.

upgrade.name: Branded workers
upgrade.effect: Workers are sold for 60% of their buy price and produce 200% milk.

upgrade.name: Tank workers
upgrade.effect: Workers are sold for 90% of their buy price and produce 300% milk.

upgrade.name: Legalization of slavery
upgrade.effect: Humans slaves can be sold for 90% of their buy price.

upgrade.name: Captive breeding
upgrade.effect: Humans slaves don't need sacrifice anymore.

upgrade.name: human guinea pig
upgrade.effect: Cattles workers can be changed into humans slaves.

upgrade.name: Animal genetic mastery
upgrade.effect: Animals slaves can be changed into humans slaves.

upgrade.name: Animal recycling project
upgrade.effect: Animals can be changed into humans slaves.

upgrade.name: Semi-animal are not human
upgrade.effect: Animals slaves can be sold for 90% of their buy price.

upgrade.name: Impoved hybridization
upgrade.effect: Animals slaves don't need sacrifice anymore.

upgrade.name: Human genetic mastery
upgrade.effect: Humans slaves can be changed into animals slaves.

upgrade.name: Human recycling project
upgrade.effect: Cattles workers can be changed into animals slaves.

upgrade.name: Mimi milker
upgrade.effect: Animals level 1 produce milk.
upgrade.desc: After collecting so much of them, maybe they can be put to use.
